content:
Ninuvakkaaril kanivundaayon shreshdhan naathhaa!
Yaachikkunnoree samghatthil krpa varshikka
Ellaa naallum nin daivathvam keertthippaanaayu
Krodhaavaha shikshaadandangall neekkeedene.
Thaatha thanujaathmaavaam Daivam vandyan thanne.
Aarambham thottennennekkum nithyam sthothram.
Kaarunyatthe ninuvakkaaril thaan varshichu
Kopatthingkal ninnum kaatthaan, sthothram naathhaa!
